trends: There have been 659 other sightings in Montgomery
There were no other sightings in Montgomery on or around November 30th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing on my back porch when this big thing came from the south and flew over my house. It came back and stopped, and sent this big blue beam down that sucked up my wife and my dog. I was too scared to do anything about it. I didn't tell anyone else about it either. I still live with my decision to let them take my wife, I didn't like her that much anyways.
Summary: Cigar-like, moved very fast, was orange in color.
